title: Good Omens interviews on Terry Pratchetts' legacy and devils on their shoulders
author: Digital Spy
comment: The chemistry between Sheen and Tennant is phenomenal in the show. Loved the episode about their relationship over the years
Filming's over! Let's all grow beards.
I personally can not say whether the book or movie is better, this has never happened before, 5 stars
I just realised how deep is Michael’s voice comparing to Aziraphale’s.
David Tennent and Michael Sheen all buddy and adorable the “I’ll tell you after” bless that’s so adorable those two have fantastic chemistry
description:
The infamous novel from Terry Pratchett and Neil Gaiman is now finally an Amazon Originals TV show with a huge cast including Michael Sheen, Jon Hamm, Miranda Richardson and David Tennant. The cast talks to us exclusively about the weight of the project and what they'd do if the apocalypse happened.
